display_name:
[Spirited New Generation] Super Saiyan Gohan (Teen) + 
Super Saiyan Trunks (Kid) & Super Saiyan Goten (Kid)

kit.leader_skill: "Hybrid Saiyans", "Youth" or "Defenders of Justice" Category Ki +3, HP +200% and ATK & DEF +170%, plus an additional HP, ATK & DEF +50% for characters who also belong to the "Siblings' Bond", "Bond of Parent and Child" or "Bond of Friendship" Category

super_attack.name: No Forgiveness for Evil!
super_attack.effect: Raises ATK for 4 turns; Causes colossal damage to enemy; Raises chance of performing; a critical hit by 10% for 4 turns

ultra_super_attack.name: Masenko
ultra_super_attack.effect: Raises DEF for 1 turn; Causes mega-colossal damage to enemy; Raises chance of performing; a critical hit by 58% for 1 turn

passive_skill.name: Peace-Protecting Fighter's Awareness
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) ATK & DEF 200% up; (Forever) Launches an additional Super Attack; (Forever) Receives an additional Ki +3 per Rainbow Ki Sphere obtained; When receiving an attack: DEF 250% up; For 1 turn from the character's entry turn: Damage reduction rate 40% up; All allies' ATK & DEF 30% up; When there is another "Hybrid Saiyans" or "Bond of Parent and Child" Category ally on the team: Ki +7 and ATK 250% up when attacking; All allies' ATK & DEF 30% up and chance of performing a critical hit 15% up (self excluded); 1 or more Rainbow Ki Spheres obtained: DEF 200% up; Damage reduction rate 38% up; Launches an additional Super Attack; ATK 200% up when attacking; 12 or more INT Ki Spheres obtained, or 5 Rainbow Ki Spheres obtained: (Once) DEF 258% up and damage reduction rate 20% up; All allies' ATK & DEF 58% up for 2 turns (self excluded)

active_skill.name: Triple Kamehameha
active_skill.effect: Massively raises ATK temporarily,; causes ultimate damage to enemy; Within the turn activated, all attacks become; critical hits; Changes all Ki Spheres; to INT & Rainbow Ki Spheres
active_skill.activation_conditions: Can be activated when there are another 2 or more "Hybrid Saiyans" Category allies on the team starting from the 3rd turn from the character's entry turn Or starting from the 5th turn from the start of battle (once only, be it before or after Reversible Exchange)
